word incorrectly to go through an entire approval process and some of those situations people don't like it slows
them down so we've added the ability to be able to dismiss code review in certain circumstances it's usually done
by an administrator of the repository or an owner of the organization but we've now actually giving you the ability to
delegate that down so if my friend Michael here for example that I want him to be able to selectively dismiss code
